const SideMenu = ({ clearChat, chatLog, setChatInput, handleSubmit, chatInput}) =>

ResumeGPT

ResumeGPT is a resume generator powered by OpenAI's GPT-3 API. It uses a dataset of 1000 resumes to train a model that can generate resumes based on your input.

setChatInput(e.target.value)} className="chat-input-textarea" >
